8225483509416707116-Puzzle.country1: the name of the country Australia
3200098429010885725-Puzzle.country1HelpU: the URL of a page with basic information about Australia
4355724231168061337-Puzzle.country2HelpU: the URL of a page with basic information about Germany
4831971084084101656-Puzzle.country3City1: the capital city of China (also known as Peking)
7513531880031229964-Puzzle.country3HelpU: the URL of a page with basic information about China
4740404346868773841-Puzzle.country4: the name of the country Brazil
4092567125241388941-Puzzle.country4City1: the city Rio de Janeiro in Brazil
172935374208882914-Puzzle.country4City2: the city São Paulo in Brazil
8973971279553647533-Puzzle.country4HelpU: the URL of a page with basic information about Brazil
188742938692613705-Puzzle.flag: noun - the official flag representing a country
942647526999045936-Puzzle.language: prompt for the user to provide the official lantgage of a country
2989183467808289061-Puzzle.languageChoos: initial text displayed in a dropdown menu from which the user should choose the language spoken in the indicated country
7544100018692826729-Puzzle.cities: a label preceding a list of cities
2353453760676853811-Puzzle.error0:
a congratulatory message displayed if the user placed all %1 blocks correctly, where %1 is an integer greater than 1.  The use of '
', which indicates a new line, is optional.
8453803544352763294-Puzzle.error1: an encouraging error message displayed if the user placed all blocks except 1 correctly.
7264063713014053084-Puzzle.error2: an error message displayed if the user misplaced %1 blocks, where %1 is an integer greater than one.
183634583247013051-Puzzle.tryAgain:
a message indicating that a visually distinguished block is incorrect and that the user should try to fix it.  The use of '
', which indicates a new line, is optional.
8960250295624246109-Puzzle.fullTitle: full title for page.  'Blockly' can be left unchanged or transliterated.
8436599549372868479-Puzzle.title: brief title for page, not including the word for Blockly.  Use the word for a jigsaw puzzle.
6508091993289219492-Puzzle.help: the label on a button the user can press for help
2827102143774531943-Puzzle.checkAnswers: a label on a button the user can press to check his/her answers
5519625826423551192-Puzzle.helpText: Instructions for the puzzle.  For context, see 'http://blockly-demo.appspot.com/static/apps/puzzle/index.html'.
5510964942765371547-Puzzle.helpImage: url of helpful image; this should only be changed by Blockly developers, not translators. (Later, create instructors for translators.)
1801477908540628476-Puzzle.helpOk: label on button for user to press when done reading help information
